IRPact_modellierung.information

Class PureInformationScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.information.InformationScheme
      • IRPact_modellierung.information.PureInformationScheme

  • public class PureInformationScheme
extends InformationScheme
    The PureInformatioScheme is an information scheme where no distortion of information is assumed, and all information corresponds to the true nature of things. It models perfect information of the ConsumerAgents (as long as they request information), and no mechanisms of subjective (or malicious) information. As such no information entering this scheme is of relevance and ignored.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PureInformationScheme()
      Constructor that doesn't instantiate the allKnowingEye.
      PureInformationScheme(SimulationContainer simulationContainer)
      In the PureInformationScheme all information stems from the allKnowingEye, an InformationAgent with unlimited (maximal) information authority

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<InformationEvent> deriveProductInformation(ConsumerAgent informationRequestingAgent, ProductAttribute productAttributeOfInterest, SimulationContainer simulationContainer)
      Since this scheme models perfect information, requesting information immediately gives the true value of all product attributes of the simulation.
      void provideInformation(InformationAgent contributingAgent, Information contributedInformation, double systemTime)
      Since information is 'pure' (and thus everything is known anyways), providing information to this scheme is of no consequence.

      • deriveProductInformation

        public java.util.Set<InformationEvent> deriveProductInformation(ConsumerAgent informationRequestingAgent,
                                                                ProductAttribute productAttributeOfInterest,
                                                                SimulationContainer simulationContainer)
        Since this scheme models perfect information, requesting information immediately gives the true value of all product attributes of the simulation.
        Specified by:
        deriveProductInformation in class InformationScheme
        Parameters:
        informationRequestingAgent - The agent that requests information about a product quality
        productAttributeOfInterest - The quality which an agent requests information about
